title: The New York Times - Special Edition - Saturday, July 4th, 2009
description: "Iraq War Ends", "Court Indicts Bush on High Treason Charge," and Times columnist Thomas J Friedman's surprising resignation letter were just a few of the strangely hopeful headlines that New Yorkers were stunned to read last November. In a stunt that made headlines across the world, over 100,000 copies of this "Special Edition" of the New York Times were handed out in Manhattan by hundreds of volunteers.
author: The New York Times
